caption: My first time eating from Bergen restaurant which was recommended by my daughter and I was pleased it was delicious and I will go back

This was such a horrible experience! It started with the host or whoever took my order for pickup. Although she was extra sweet she had no idea what was on the menu. When we receive our food it was cold and the fish & shrimp combos were terrible. Neither the fish or shrimp had absolutely no flavor (seasoning) it had been cooked in what apperead to be old coooking grease. The fish was soggy and you can smell the burnt grease. It was not even remotely edible. I would not even feed it to my dog! I was highly disappointed because when they first opened it was amazing. It was cool to see a black owned  restaurant deliver quality food.  But this go round made me never want to eat from there again

Ordered through seamless was missing a wing combo. Was told I need to come pick it up. Told them I pay delivery fees I’m not coming to get it. They told me it would be delivered original order was around 3pm food was delivered by 4:45 missing item still not delivered it’s 6:42 pm. Smh will never order from them again

I ordered some food and received the wrong order. I called and was told I will get my correct order in 30-40 minutes. Never came. Called back they said it's on it's way never came. Called back no answer. I will never patronize that place again and the food is not that great
Worst food! ND RUDE STAFF!
Really awesome food — like, REALLY great. Worst delivery experience I’ve ever had. Waiting two hours to have half an order show up and have it be wrong is pretty brutal.
Ordinary food. No real flavor,  boring shrimp and fries. And the special sauce is made with cinnamon. I wasn't a happy camper, and I will not be coming back. 😔
Burger: Aces. Chicken Sandwich: chef's kiss. So happy to have the Bergen in our neighborhood. Appreciated the service and that they got our order in before the kitchen closed.

Keep trying them thinking ‘’maybe this time it will be better”. Never is. Terrible service, cold, salty food. If they don’t have an item you ordered they won’t call you to see if you’d like something else, they just won’t send it. Leaves for an awkward situation when you get your (bad) food and your roommate doesn’t... go literally anywhere else.

I wish I could tell you what the food tasted like, but unfortunately I’m allergic to shrimp and someone mixed my Fish&Chips order up with the Fish, Shrimp, and Chips. I ordered through DoorDash and alerted them. I tried to call the establishment and the phone is disconnected.
Bad long time late. Give a Rong food
Great Food long wait be prepared to wait 15 to 20 minutes for your food BUT the food is really good and cooked well I would recommend it if you want some soul food.
The fish and chips was great but the hamburger bun was so soggy wet.They might need to put that great sauce in a separate container. Otherwise, it would had been a great sandwich.

Good Food ... Great Service .. FYI If You Are Black And Complain About A Bad Experience At This Spot & Wanna Write them off , Pls make sure you keep that SAME ENERGY FOR MCDONALDS STARBUCKS & every other Caucasian ran Food Chains .. SMH
Poor customer  experience

Ordered from here twice. The first time, they forgot my drink. The second time, my food was cold. The delivery address is not that far from the restaurant so I don’t know why it was so cold. My wings weren’t that fresh, probably wings from the day before since I ordered when they first opened. The packaged blue cheese was from some off brand name...it was very runny...I tossed it. Not pleased at all and won’t be ordering from this restaurant again.
Great food!  In particular the fried wings. The blue velvet cake is delicious.  A no go on the carrot cake.

I'm a postmates and doordash delivery courier. Staff was all over the place. People were walking in and out of the restaurant near orders. Long Wait times. I don't like this location much. The staff that I did talk to were nice though so that's something.
Love it
Great
If I could give zero stars I would.. waste of time! Could have went somewhere else.
Just Horrible Overall With Deliveries  Food Handled Very Much Poorly And Falsely Advertised.
Great food, but not good customer service.  I really dislike giving Black Owned business negative comments
Im really impressed with the food here. Probably the best burger I’ve had in Brooklyn. I’m in town on business and we had their burgers, fish sandwiches, wings. It was all incredible.
I will not EVER order from this place again... received my food within 2 hours, and was given scraps smh
Staff here is unprofessional and food service was poor.
The food so far has been good. I've tried the grilled 🐔 tacos, 🍠 🍟 and basa 🐟 all dishes were great. Not a very long wait time if you don't pre-order. The wait staff is friendly and professional!!!
Ordered on caviar and came quickly! Order was missing shrimp, but the fish and chips were still 🔥🔥
Fresh and delicious food

If I could give them 0 stars I would. I ordered food that never came, then I couldn't get in touch with the restaurant. Had to get a refund from seamless. Support black businesses, how about support good businesses. Loss my business for good, bye.
Every time I ordered everything was good They might miss an item but it still is worth buying

The customer service was absolutely terrible! The cashier/server said that there was no menu and asking her questions were literally like pulling teeth. I called before I left NJ and asked if there was outdoor dining and was told yes and came here in spite of the negative reviews. The owner/operator of the establishment was at the restaurant and seemed to appear interested in what my concerns were. There was no one wiping down the outdoor tables at all. I asked if that could be done and he told me that i had high expectations. He told me that his server did one thing wrong and wanted to explain why he hires people like her. He wanted to have a conversation about what I felt was wrong, and then told me that in a minute he would “tell me no” regarding wiping down the table. He asked where I was from and nodded his head which was also super offensive. I’ve never experienced anything like this ever. I will not be coming back.
The food was halfway cooked and not properly secured. The bag fell and all the food spilled out.
Poor attention, guys if you want get a good place, please. Remove the front girl, her attention is disgusting.
The food was overly salty ! I needed 2 cups of water after eating it

If I could give 0 stars I would! It would be even better if I could give negative stars. The customer service with the MANAGER, was soooo horrible it could be recorded and used as a tutorial video during manager training sessions on what NOT TO DO. When I called to explain to the manager that I ordered 3 fried platters 2 fish,shrimp,fries and 1 shrimp and fries and that we only received 1 2oz portion of tartar sauce and ketchup she said “you got what you got” because they were out of the sauce apparently. Don’t understand how you can be out of KETCHUP and TARTAR sauce but think it would be a acceptable thing to send only 1 2oz portion of ketchup an tartar sauce. Then when the customer calls the best answer you can give them is “we are out so you got what you got” and hang up... Then when I call back multiple times to speak to someone higher up “the owner” I am told they are not there. WELL OBVIOUSLY THEY AREN’T THERE BECAUSE I WOULDN'T BE SPEAKING TO YOU AT THIS POINT! So when I asked for a contact I was again hung up on. She was so incredibly nasty and rude. Last, as we went to taste the food the fish tasted old and the texture was very chewy and slimy. Not anything near a fried fish texture even after being in a container for an hour. Now I’m trying to dispute it through door dash for this $60 meal I received. IF YOU’RE READING THIS DO NOT GO THERE! Save your money and your time!.
Food is bomb!

Food is tasty, but the wait is kind of ridiculous. Also, we've gone twice and both times the orders were subtly incorrect - be very specific when ordering about toppings, sauces, etc, or you might get something you didn't order.
Rude waitress and the food took almost an hour. I thought they went fishing for my food
Slow as molasses I was on my lunch break took forever
Great staff esp the expo!

If I could give this place a 0 I would. I order from here through Caviar because the food looked good and I wanted to support black business. The food I got was old, cold, and not even what I ordered. They sent me food with no sides that I paid for. When I called and left a message no one called me back. The food look so bad that we couldn't even eat them. $70 dollars in the trash along with this food.

Definitely was not a good experience. My cousin and I waited an hour for them to tell us they ran out of what she ordered even though people that ordered after us received their food( the same thing she ordered). I received my food and was given the wrong sauce that I specifically said I did not want. Also the piece of chicken that I received for my sandwich was so small it shouldn’t have even been used. It also smelled like it was cooked in fish oil. The fries were absolutely disgusting. It tasted as I would imagine crushed tree bark would taste. I was HIGHLY disappointed.

Terribly unprofessional - I ordered and was told that my food would take about 10 or 15 minutes. At the time of this writing, I’ve been waiting about 53 minutes. I got what felt like a half hearted apology about 5 minutes ago. I just received my food at the 55 minute mark. Please set the correct expectation for your patrons.

I finally found a spot in my neighborhood that serve delious food and good customer service, good vibes and great music on weekends.... I love the Jerk Chicken salad which is amazing, Bufflo Wings, Fish, Shrimp and fried crab legs, just to name a few... Alot more I'd love to try. Everything was delious. A must have!

Good food. Poor service. i like the food here so little mishaps are no big deal but this was my very last order here. A whole sandwich was missing from my order. When I called to inform the restaurant I was told that the team noticed the missing item just as the delivery guy took the food. I’m still stuck on the part where NO ONE THOUGHT TO REACH OUT TO THE CUSTOMER.  Nope.

I'd like to give a great review but I never received my food. When I called to check on the status over an hour later she said I would have to come in bc she didn't have a courier at this point. ISI asked several questions including why wasn't contacted. She said the order had been sitting there and I should "come get it." I paid for it to be delivered. She hung up on me with a "goodnight."  What bothers me is how rude she was instead of getting me my order. I can't stand bad service.
I waited hours of the food, they made thousands of Excuses. The food here is NOT worth waiting almost 2 hours for. And it wasn’t even busy. Like I’m Hungary
Great tasting seafood!
Garbage. Personel needs training. Service horrible. Wouldn't eat that trash. Ever.

Oh boy the customer service here is the worst I’ve ever seen, especially the woman that is taking orders. She’s very disrespectful, in front of my eyes she disrespected about 3 pick up/delivery guys and 1 person trying to place an order, she should be fired and she should never work at places like that... Disgusted
Food was on point! Lemon pepper wings were so flavor. Truffle fries really good. Staff pleasant and courteous
Great food, great prices, and great people. Best local shrimp i've had in a while!
Excellent wait staff , Excellent Sea Food

This place has the worst Delivery & customer service I’ve ever dealt with in my life. I don’t normally write reviews but today I’m compelled to do so. As of right now. I have been waiting for my order for 2 and Half hours. I’ve called the Bergen, after the long hold time I was told that the driver is on his way. After explaining how long I’ve been waiting. I was told to cancel my order and order from somewhere else if I didn’t want to wait. Not the answer I was expecting. This place has terrible customer service and a horrible delivery guy. Great food terrible service period
The food was fresh...the chicken tacos were okay.  Wait for food was a bit long they seem to take lots of online orders so patience is required.
Extremely long wait (2hrs) as a delivery driver. I had to cancel the order
Horrible I wait for 53 min just for one hamburger. Don’t go
Food was a amazing and fresh!
Great food...but the wait is crazy.
Horrible
Fried fish ok chicken better

The Jerk Chicken Salad is delicious. The chicken is perfectly seasoned and cooked! I’m ready to try more of The Bergen’s food. Happy to support a local Black business who is also doing impactful community work.
Great lil spot!!! Just dont close down!!!

We placed an order via phone directly to the establishment. I have been waiting 3 hours for my order as of right now. The young lady said they are waiting for a driver. This is ridiculous and unprofessional. The food better taste like Jesus himself made it at this point.  Furthermore,  when you call the line is always busy or ringing with no hope of an answer.  Never again.  Edit:we just called and the young lady told us they are closed!!! It is now 9:33pm and we ordered from 6:00pm. Outrageous! There was no communication whatsoever.  We called the establishment repeatedly and it took them until now to tell us the restaurant was closed. Beware for delivery!!!

This place is a welcome addition to the neighborhood! The food is awesome (highly recommend the Nashville hot chicken sandwich and spicy honey wings) and the owners have a generous heart as evidenced by the fact that during Covid they've been giving away free food to the community everyday.  My only complaint is that both times we've gone they've forgotten part of our order. The first time we caught it right away and were able to get our missing wings added, but the second time we didn't realize we were missing our two orders of fries until we got home. Bummer! So my recommendation: go, but make sure you've got everything before you walk away.

I ordered through grubhub. It took my order 3 hours to arrive. It was so thrown around and disgusting. Half of the order was missing. One plate looked as if it was eaten. The food looked as if it were old. I have Never had a good experience like this. And it’s Sad because I heard great things. This was my first and very last time buying anything from here. I also have pictures to prove it and have filed a complaint through DoorDash.

Im not normally one to leave bad reviews but i just feel like this is false advertising... i got the “loaded fries” and by loaded they mean maybe sprinked with a tiny bit of parmesan and maybe 3-4 pieces of bacon. I also left a note asking to make the chicken sandwich spicy, which was also ignored. The guacamole on top was less than a spoonful, so this place pretty much just stiffs you.

The worse experience in my life, the wait was ridiculously long l waited 2hrs for an order, and I would never buy from there again, restaurant not sanitary at all, basement with a freezer with food and the entire ground around that freezer was ankle high in dirty water.
I’m so annoyed that I found this place a week and a half before I move out of NYC! Such a good bbq chicken sandwich. Good price and great chicken quality.
Ordered on seamless never came
The Bergen will be the reason I get a gym membership after this quarantine is over.... and just add "THE O.G BURGER"  to your meal you won't be disappointed....

If I could give this place -5 stars, I would. I placed an order online for pickup, food was not made on time. Waited almost an hour for food to find out my order was messed up. I mentioned I would like to cancel the order, the host was very rude. I WOULD NEVER IN MY LIFE WOULD I GO BACK OR RECOMMEND THIS PLACE.

Won't be back....a salad with no tomatoes.. or cucumbers and then bring questioned about how often do we eat and if we "do" this to every restaurant..... is all a recipe for me to not go back... EVER!!!!

I have eaten just about every item on this menu. And I have NEVER been disappointed. The food is great. Well seasoned. Great portions. GREAT FLAVOR! Always delivered hot and perfectly packed. No spills or leaks. When I do pick-up I'm greeted and served by a very friendly and professional staff. As soon as I see a new item added to the menu I run and order it because I KNOW it's going to be a winner and I will not be disappointed. If you're looking for quality food this is your place to go. There's something on the menu for everyone in the family. #TheBergenBK

I've ordered from The Bergen a number of times and admittedly had ups and downs. There can be a bit of a wait, but the staff is friendly and apologizes for the wait. The great thing is they are open to the criticism and have worked out the downs. And I'm sure will continue to do so with all feedback.  My favorites from the menu, so far, are the Troy Ave shrimp and chips (sweet potato fries for me!) and the BBQ wings. The shrimp are so FLAVORFUL and have a nice crisp to them without being too crunchy or hard. And those fries are tasty with a lil Bergen sauce.  I had heard talks about the chicken sandwich being taken off the menu, but I'm excited to see it's still there because I'm coming for it!  The Bergen has been doing it up for the community during this pandemic. I appreciate the love and the dedication from the owner and staff.
Great food and juices. Owner and staff are friendly and welcoming. That Bergen sauce gets me all the time. 😋

A rat ran inside the store from the garbage heap on the curb while I was waiting- they shut the door keeping it inside. An employee said "well then don't come back" when confronted by a fellow patron* about an unforeseen 75 minute wait time. My order was ready 15 minutes before it was handed to me despite me being at the store the whole time. Food isn't that good and certainly not worth the bs. Most disappointing fact is I look to support black owned businesses and will turn a blind eye toward shortcomings but this was egregious.

This place is alright & the have a new restaurant within the same place called Thick Chick. Ordered from this place 3 times &  wouldn't recommend ordering from either because it takes too long just for 2 simply items. For one of my orders I honestly had 3 dashers from doordash cancel delivery from this place because they have to wait FOREVER & I honestly feel bad for them.  Each time I ordered it took an hour & an half to receive which is including the 25 min drive time from the restaurant to my house.
It gives you options
Food was actually very tasty and Delicious it was my 1st time ordering and it wont be my last I order fish tacos , shrimp po boy , and dry jerk wings all 3 was good ...
Food is great But serving size could be much larger for their prices
Never received my order called they phone and no one picking up also spoke to someone and was told it was on the way at 7 and now here it is 11:15

After waiting 2 & 1/2  hours for my food and being lied to twice on the phone ("It's 30 minutes away!"), I canceled my order.  I went out to buy food because now I'm starving.  After returning from the store, now over 3 hours since I ordered, my phone rings and it's the delivery guy trying to hand me this disgusting rain soaked bag of cold food.  I've never ordered from The Bergen before and I usually like to give a place a couple chances but they do not seem to have it together.

After having problems ordering from grub hub, I called the store directly trying to resolve the issue after waiting over two hours. Apparently grub hub didn’t even submit my order ( not dealing with grub hub ever again). After a few calls, the owner got on the phone and took my order even tho it was late. I must say , the food was worth the wait, I loved it, and the hands on response to my problem. I thank the owner so much, I truly enjoyed my meal... I recommend it to all. I will be frequenting it often !!!
The Bergen Burger and fries is really good!  I will be back soon.

I haven't been able to experience this awesome spot yet but plan to when the outside is open again :) Thank you to the staff and everyone here for doing great work for the community during this trying time.
The service is so slow. It’s not worth the wait.
Food is good but service is slow
Food is good great service. Yesterday was just a bad day for everybody I can't blame you for that.
The food is usually good but today is sucked really bad
Quality service n gd food!
Excellent customer service. Fried whiting was fried to perfection. The special sauce is amazing. I will definitely order from here again
Everything was good from the food to the service. It's mainly take out. But it seems perfect for any kind of get togethers. Sports, friends over or just good eating
